body_html:
On Tue, Aug 15, 2017 at 06:26:04AM +0000, nolan liu wrote: you should initialize the variable before `sess.run`. Add the line blow to your code. `sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())`
I do not do session.run(). I even do not have a session yet. It is the graph construction that fails.
…
-- Yegor Derevenets
body_text:
On Tue, Aug 15, 2017 at 06:26:04AM +0000, nolan liu wrote:
 you should initialize the variable before `sess.run`. Add the line
 blow to your code.  `sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())`
I do not do session.run(). I even do not have a session yet. It is the
graph construction that fails.
…
-- 
Yegor Derevenets
body:
On Tue, Aug 15, 2017 at 06:26:04AM +0000, nolan liu wrote:
> you should initialize the variable before `sess.run`. Add the line
> blow to your code.  `sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())`

I do not do session.run(). I even do not have a session yet. It is the
graph construction that fails.

-- 
Yegor Derevenets
